sources: R.I. Super. R. Civ. P. 10(a) (caption format)
R.I. Super. R. Civ. P. 7(b) (motion requirements)

caption.courtNameFormat: STATE OF RHODE ISLAND, {COUNTY} COUNTY SUPERIOR COURT
caption.sampleTemplate:
STATE OF RHODE ISLAND
{COUNTY} COUNTY SUPERIOR COURT

{PLAINTIFFS},

     Plaintiff(s),

v.

{DEFENDANTS},

     Defendant(s).

C.A. No. {CASE_NUMBER}

{MOTION_TITLE}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Rhode Island that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Rhode Island uses 'C.A. No.' (Civil Action Number) as the case label
Superior Court is the trial court of general jurisdiction
Providence County handles the majority of civil filings
